Hello

Intro myself -- He goes by the name Luke Hedger. He's a front-to-back-end web developer who makes robust web apps that people want to use again & again. He delivers expert HTML, CSS, JavaScript and only the freshest ideas straight to the Internet. He prides himself in carefully designing and hand-crafting every website he builds. This here is his portfolio-of-sorts. If you've got an idea you want to discuss please get in touch!
